name: Out of Key
description:
Out of Key is a small puzzle game, made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020, about trying to get through a mountain of a day without running out of controls.

In each puzzle you'll be given a limited amount of keys that you can press to get to the portal. You are encouraged to hold keys for as long as you need, but you only have so many presses.

Credits:

  • Programming, Game and Level Design - Palenar
  • Art - Kris10
  • Sound Effect - Palenar and Kris10
  • Music - "Forest Ambience" by Rick Hoppmann
